diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+# API Contract Tests
+
+It's highly recommended to use [Virtualenv](https://virtualenv.pypa.io/en/latest/)
+in order to have an isolated environment.
+
+From the root directory of the project
+
+1. `virtualenv venv`
+2. `source venv/bin/activate` to turn on the virtualenv
+2. `./venv/bin/pip install -r test-requirements.txt`
body_text: These docs seem to collide with our normal setup docs. For example, we suggest naming the virtualenv venv as well, and the two aren't compatible. It probably also needs to be called out that these need to be Python 2.
body: These docs seem to collide with our normal setup docs. For example, we suggest naming the virtualenv `venv` as well, and the two aren't compatible. It probably also needs to be called out that these need to be Python 2.
body_html: These docs seem to collide with our normal setup docs. For example, we suggest naming the virtualenv venv as well, and the two aren't compatible. It probably also needs to be called out that these need to be Python 2.
